DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of RP5063 relative to placebo for the treatment of schizophrenia or schizoaffective disorder.
DOC.brief_title: RP5063 in Subjects With Schizophrenia or Schizoaffective Disorder
DOC.criteria: Patients providing informed consent prior to any study specific procedures Patients meeting Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders, Fourth Edition, Text Revision (DSMIVTR) criteria for schizophrenia (paranoid type, disorganized type, catatonic type or undifferentiated type), or schizoaffective disorder Patients with normal physical examination, laboratory, vital signs,and electrocardiogram (ECG) Patients with other primary psychiatric disorders as delirium, or bipolar I or II disorder
